entry.title: CCSCodeStandard
entry.summary:
CCSCodeStandard enforces consistent VB.NET coding & naming standards via Roslyn analyzers and automated fixes.

Core features:

  • Type based variable/field/parameter prefixes (int, str, dt, obj, etc.) with field/const modifiers (g/m, gc/mc)
  • Missing 'As' clause detection with quick + combined fixes
  • Automatic default value initialization (locals/fields)
  • Implicit For Each variable typing & renaming (adds As & correct prefix, updates usages)
  • SQL CommandText 'dbo.' prefix enforcement
  • Short name (len <=3) expansion suggestions
  • Variable names with underscore detection & fix recommendations
  • String literal standardization (replaces "" with String.Empty where appropriate)
  • "And/Or" replacement with "AndAlso/OrElse" (except for bit comparisons)
  • "Is Nothing" / "IsNot Nothing" standardization (replaces = Nothing and <> Nothing)
  • Error handler validation for functions with automatic insertion
  • Empty return path detection in Function calls with fixes
  • SQL parameter length validation (prevents >0 length on Int/DateTime parameters)
  • Bulk Fix window: select / filter / apply & save all fixes at once

Compatible with Visual Studio 2019-2022 and .NET Framework projects

Remember Ant is watching
